body.p:
To his Excelency Thomas E Bramlett
govner of the commonwealth

The Citizens of Perry County would Respectfully Represent to your honor that Elizah Messer Stands indicted in the perry Circuit Court for one of the most wilful murders that Ever was Committed in the state of Ky the man that was murdered was by the name of Henry Combs a Soleger Belonging to the nineteenth Ky Regiment vol infantry and was at home on furlow at the time he was murdered we under Stand that there has been a petition Sent to Excelency asking you to pardon him your petitionners would Respectfully Say to you that the good citizens of this county would greatly Regret the Pardoning of said messer as he was a Bad man Befor the war and has murdered various others besides Combs
